== Muganayakanakote (611748) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Muganayakanakote is a village in the [[Gubbi ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 358.7 hectares and harbouring 554 households with total population of 2159 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Gubbi]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 1084 and female population is 1075. Scheduled Caste Population is 560 and Scheduled Tribes population is 339. Census Location Code of the village is 611748<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 1408 (65.22%)
* Literate male population: 774 (71.4%)
* Literate female population: 634 (58.98%)
